author: brianp
msg: Added faster logic for decodehtml to handle the special case
where the string being decoded doesn't have any ampersands
in it (e.g., because it's the value for an 'include virtual=...')

author: brianp
msg: Exclude the terminating null byte from the length of
the convention used throughout the rest of the httpd,
and it saves a small amount of processing)

author: brianp
msg: Optimization: changed some apr_pstrndup calls to apr_pstrmemdup

author: brianp
msg: Reduced the number of strlen operations in ap_getword()

author: brianp
msg: Modified ap_make_full_path to minimize the number of strlen operations
